text.text: Mr. Basa has more than 29 years of global experience in gold mining and development as a professional hydrometallurgical engineer with a focus on milling, gravity concentration, flotation, leaching and refining of precious and base metals. He graduated from McGill University with a B.A. in Engineering in 1983 and has been a member of the Professional Engineers of Ontario since 1987. He has served as Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of Granada Gold Mine Inc., a company listed on the TSXV, since June 2004.
